data.description:
NEW environment, challenges and equipment!

COLORBALL is a mix of Dodgeball and the classic Bubble Shooter games, topped with archery, saber and boxing movements... A unique sport that can only exist in VR.

YOUR MISSION
Catch and throw, smash, shoot, push, box... balls to other balls with the same color - everything is allowed!

YOUR EQUIPMENT
Bow and arrow, laser swords, boxing gloves, gravity bracelets, slow motion watch or your bare hands.

YOUR CHALLENGE
Don't get hit by any ball!
